name: Way of the Long Death
description: Monks obsessed with the study of mortality, using their knowledge to manipulate life and death.

3.name: Touch of Death
3.description: When you reduce a creature within 5 feet to 0 hit points, gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier + monk level.

6.name: Hour of Reaping
6.description: As an action, frighten creatures within 30 feet that can see you until the end of your next turn on a failed Wisdom save.

11.name: Mastery of Death
11.description: When reduced to 0 hit points, spend 1 ki point to have 1 hit point instead.

17.name: Touch of the Long Death
17.description: As an action, touch a creature and spend 1 to 10 ki points; the target takes 2d10 necrotic damage per ki point on a failed Constitution save, or half as much on a success.
